title: Cant Move
body: Recently my champion hasn't been able to move. I keep right clicking and yet he just stays  there its nothing wrong with the mouse. pls help me.

replies.body: Please respond to this, my champion also stays there, it can't move no matter how much you click. Whats annoying it's that the champion can't move, but the game still goes on, and its not a problem with my mouse. Please help so i can get back to playing .-.
you need to go to the settings ingame and go to hotkeys and look for champ move click it and then right click later pressing okay that solved the problem for me

Champions ignoring your commands and weird movements can mostly be traced back to packet loss or some type of issue with your config files. Are any of the other champions or minions moving oddly, or are any of your other keybinds not working?

i have solved the issue
ty for your response
